HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DIV.PRE: This feature class contains points associated with the line feature class for rail-trails in the state of Pennsylvania, as prepared by the Rails-to-Trails Conservancy. The majority of data was collected using GPS units and checked for quality and accuracy against high-resolution aerial imagery. See Method. Data was collected between November 2007 and August 2008. See Subtype Code for point type.
Developed for Pennsylvania Dept. of Conservation and Natural Resources.

DL.DT: Theme_Keyword:rail-trails, bike trails, multi-use paths, Rails-to-Trails Conservancy
Access_Constraints:Access by authorization of Rail-to-Trails Conservancy.

DIV.PRE: For use by Pennsylvania Dept. of Conservation and Natural Resource.

DL.DD: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

DL.DT: Altitude_Encoding_Method:Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

DIV.PRE: Status - Open, Under Construction, Proposed, or Conceptual

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: Trail is former Rail Corridor, 1= yes, 2 = no
Surface Type(s), 1 = asphalt, 2 = crushed stone, 3 = road, 4 = natural surface/gravel/ballast, 5 = unknown
Collection Method, 1 = GPS, 2 = Digitized PA Map Aerial, 3 = Digitized DRG, 4 = Digitized DOQQ, 5 = Best Guess

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
